definitions.definition: Of or relating to the middle class ( often derogatory ) , and their presumed overly conventional , conservative , and materialistic values .
Of or relating to the bourgeoisie , the third estate of the French Ancien Regime .
Of or relating to the capitalist class , ( usually derogatory ) the capitalist exploitation of the proletariat .

main_definition: Of or relating to the middle class ( often derogatory ) , and their presumed overly conventional , conservative , and materialistic values .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) Of or relating to the bourgeoisie , the third estate of the French Ancien Regime .
( Marxism ) Of or relating to the capitalist class , ( usually derogatory ) the capitalist exploitation of the proletariat .
